title: Asian Stocks Rise, Extending Record Global Rally: Markets Wrap
description: Stocks in Asia extended their two-day advance after bullish momentum lifted shares on Wall Street, indicating that a much-touted year-end rally is taking hold.
content: Stocks in Asia extended their two-day advance after bullish momentum lifted shares on Wall Street, indicating that a much-touted year-end rally is taking hold.
